statements: UPDATE recipes SET ingredients = ARRAY['salt', 'pepper', 'onion'] WHERE recipe_id = 5;
UPDATE comments SET user_id = 10, comment = 'This recipe is great!' WHERE recipe_id = 3;
UPDATE recipes SET ingredients = ARRAY['onion', 'tomato', 'garlic'] WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE comments SET comment = 'This recipe is amazing!' WHERE recipe_id = 2 AND user_id = 1;
UPDATE recipe_archive SET instructions = 'Mix all ingredients together', ingredients = ARRAY['Flour', 'Sugar', 'Eggs'] WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE user_comments SET comment = 'Great recipe! Thanks for sharing.' WHERE comment_id = 2;
UPDATE recipe_archive SET instructions = 'Mix well and bake at 350°F for 30 minutes', ingredients = ARRAY['flour', 'sugar', 'butter', 'eggs'], date_published = '2022-08-15' WHERE recipe_id = 101;
UPDATE user_comments SET comment = 'This recipe was delicious! I will definitely make it again.', date_posted = '2022-08-20 15:30:00' WHERE comment_id = 201;
UPDATE recipe_archive SET recipe_name = 'Spaghetti Carbonara', instructions = 'Cook spaghetti and mix with egg, cheese, and pancetta.' WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE website_analytics SET user_id = 1001, page_url = '/blog/post1' WHERE visit_id = 10;

UPDATE recipe_archive SET recipe_name = 'Spicy Chicken Pasta', ingredients = 'Chicken, Pasta, Tomatoes, Spices', instructions = '1. Cook pasta. 2. Saute chicken with spices. 3. Mix everything together.' WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE user_comments SET comment_text = 'This recipe is amazing! I tried it yesterday and everyone loved it.', user_id = 1234, created_at = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE comment_id = 5;
UPDATE recipes SET title = 'Spaghetti Carbonara', instructions = 'Cook pasta, fry bacon, mix with egg and cheese' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE comments SET user_name = 'Alice', comment = 'This recipe is delicious!' WHERE recipe_id = 2;
UPDATE recipes SET author='John Doe', ingredients='1 cup flour, 2 eggs, 1 tsp salt', instructions='Mix all ingredients together and bake at 350°F for 30 minutes' WHERE title='Chocolate Cake';
UPDATE comments SET comment='This recipe is amazing! I tried it last night and everyone loved it.', timestamp='2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE recipe_id=124;
UPDATE recipes SET title='Updated Recipe Title' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE comments SET comment_text='Updated Comment Text', user_id=3 WHERE id=10;
UPDATE recipes SET ingredients = 'Flour, sugar, eggs, butter' WHERE title = 'Pancake Recipe';
UPDATE comments SET comment_text = 'Great recipe!' WHERE user_id = 123 AND created_at > '2022-01-01';
